title: Ep. 936 - Here Lies CNN+, May It Rest In Peace
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, tragedy strikes as CNN’s new streaming service crashes and burns right after take off. Also, Republicans in Florida officially passed the bill to revoke Disney’s special privileges, but some conservatives are uncomfortable with this kind of aggressiveness from the Right.  And Johnny Depp has audio proving that he is the victim of domestic abuse. AOC warns about another January 6th on the horizon. And Jen Psaki tries to explain why kindergarten teachers might need to talk about gender identity with their students. Her reasoning leaves a lot to be desired. 

I am now a beloved LGBTQ+ and children’s author. Reserve your copy of Johnny The Walrus here: https://utm.io/ud1j6

Use code RIPCNN+ for 20% off your Daily Wire membership: https://utm.io/uevnz. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
